titles.title: If You Move Over Just A Little Bit

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
If you move over just a little bit
I'll lend you a helping hand
Though the way seems rough and hard
Together we can stand
I know just what you've been going through
I've been down that same old road
If you move over just a little bit
I'll help you carry that load.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I woke up this morning with heaven on my mind
And glory down in my soul
The Spirit of the Lord was filling me
Making Hallelujahs roll
I felt like I could just run and run
For miles on down that road
If you move over just a little bit
I'll help you carry that load.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
If you'll let me help you carry that load
Then you'll not have to stop
Lift up your eyes and look ahead
For there is a mountain top
And as soon as you get on top of that hill
You'll be so glad you tried
We'll sing and shout together
Coming down the other side.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I know Satan's been talking to you
He's been telling you a lie
Telling you that you can't go on
And there's no use to try
I know just what He'd like to do
He'd like to see you fall
But if you move over just a little bit
I'll help you carry that load.
